nodes.text: T'gronish was an artist known around the time of the Mandalorian Wars. A producer of statuary works, T'gronish's creations were familiar to Dremullar Obohn di Garthos, one of the curators of the Obohn Gallery of the Industrial Aesthetic on the planet Ralltiir.
The only mention to date of T'gronish in Star Wars canon was in the 2008 short story Labor Pains, written by John Jackson Miller.
